name: 4.8.1-beta.0
releaseNotes:
- Fixed some storage issues when exiting playing mode
- Resolved the color space issue when playing HEVC (H.265) videos in H/W decoding mode
- Improved and restyled the UI and interaction design
<!---->
- 修复快速退出播放模式时数据可能损坏的问题
- 修复 HEVC (H.265) 硬件解码时画面可能偏色的问题
- 优化了部分交互操作
